quote: The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.
name: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: In today’s rush, we all think too much, seek too much, want too much and forget about the joy of just being.
name: Eckhart Tolle

quote: The body benefits from movement, and the mind benefits from stillness.
name: Sakyong Mipham

quote: Almost everything will work again if you unplug it for a few minutes, including you.
name: Anne Lamott

quote: Feelings come and go like clouds in a windy sky. Conscious breathing is my anchor.
name: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Mindfulness is about being fully awake in our lives. It is about perceiving the exquisite vividness of each moment.
name: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: With mindfulness, you can establish yourself in the present in order to touch the wonders of life that are available in that moment.
name: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: The best way to capture moments is to pay attention. This is how we cultivate mindfulness.
name: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
name: Buddha

quote: When we are mindful, deeply in touch with the present moment, our understanding of what is going on deepens, and we begin to be filled with acceptance, joy, peace and love.
name: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: The mind is just like a muscle - the more you exercise it, the stronger it gets and the more it can expand.
name: Idowu Koyenikan

quote: Health is a state of body. Wellness is a state of being.
name: J. Stanford

quote: Healing is a matter of time, but it is sometimes also a matter of opportunity.
name: Hippocrates

quote: Wellness is the complete integration of body, mind, and spirit - the realization that everything we do, think, feel, and believe has an effect on our state of well-being.
name: Greg Anderson

quote: Awareness is the greatest agent for change.
name: Eckhart Tolle

quote: The secret of health for both mind and body is not to mourn for the past, not to worry about the future, or not to anticipate troubles, but to live in the present moment wisely and earnestly.
name: Buddha

quote: Every time you are tempted to react in the same old way, ask if you want to be a prisoner of the past or a pioneer of the future.
name: Deepak Chopra

quote: Mindfulness isn't difficult, we just need to remember to do it.
name: Sharon Salzberg

quote: Taking care of yourself doesn't mean me first, it means me too.
name: L.R. Knost

quote: Nourishing yourself in a way that helps you blossom in the direction you want to go is attainable, and you are worth the effort.
name: Deborah Day

quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
name: Sam Levenson

quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
name: Booker T. Washington

quote: Your imagination is your preview of life’s coming attractions.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Winning isn’t everything, but wanting to win is.
name: Vince Lombardi

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day-in and day-out.
name: Robert Collier

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it.
name: Unknown

quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
name: Plutarch

quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone’s cloud.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: Life is short, and it’s up to you to make it sweet.
name: Sarah Louise Delany

quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
name: Charles Kingsleigh

quote: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
name: Robert F. Kennedy

quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
name: John Muir

quote: Make each day your masterpiece.
name: John Wooden

quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
name: C.S. Lewis

quote: Believe and act as if it were impossible to fail.
name: Charles Kettering

quote: You must do the thing you think you cannot do.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.
name: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
name: Steve Jobs

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
name: Albert Schweitzer

quote: The best way out is always through.
name: Robert Frost

quote: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.
name: Milton Berle

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
name: Walt Disney

quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
name: Unknown

quote: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
name: Unknown

quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
name: Bo Bennett

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
name: Walt Whitman

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
name: C.S. Lewis

quote: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
name: Muhammad Ali

quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
name: Christian D. Larson

quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
name: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
name: William James

quote: We become what we think about most of the time, and that's the strangest secret.
name: Earl Nightingale

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: I never dreamed about success, I worked for it.
name: Estée Lauder

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
name: Sam Levenson

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
name: Steve Jobs

quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
name: Dalai Lama
